title: Tuchel Has The Blues
description:
The FC Crew talk Champions League matches including PSG's 2-1 win against Juventus and Chelsea's surprising loss to Dinamo Zagreb. Also Manchester City's dominate 4-0 win over Sevilla and Real Madrid's 3-0 win over Celtic despite losing their star striker Karim Benzema. Plus, a lookahead to Champions League Fixtures tomorrow between Liverpool and Napoli and Tottenham and Marseille.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: PSG win over Juventus; Chelsea Shocking Loss to Dinamo Zagreb; Haaland Scores a Brace in Manchester City Win, Real Madrid Win Despite Losing Benzema
